metadata.title: CVE-2021-43306 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: An exponential ReDoS (Regular Expression Denial of Service) can betriggered in the jquery-validation npm package, when an attacker is able tosupply arbitrary input to the url2 method

criterions.comment: civicrm: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
